hero.subtitle: Stack na aikace-aikacen Move na buɗe-tushe wanda ke ba da kayan aikin gaba ɗaya don gina aikace-aikacen da ba su da tushe (DApps) da aikace-aikacen da suke kan sarkar gaba ɗaya.

features.title: Fasaloli
features.mainTitle: Stack na Move tare da Iyawa mara iyaka

moveCompatible.title: 100% mai jituwa da Move
moveCompatible.description: Yi amfani da yanayin da ke akwai na Move don amfanin ku.

zeroGas.title: kudin gas sifili
zeroGas.description: Yana ba da damar aikin ya rufe wannan kashe kudi, yana tallafawa fadada sassauci da daidaitawa.

unlimited.title: Mara iyaka
unlimited.subtitle: Ma'amaloli a cikin dakika
unlimited.description: Ya dogara da adadin tashoshi na dubhe da ke aiki a lokaci guda.

community.title: Al'umma
community.mainTitle: Shiga cikin al'ummar duniya a bayan Dubhe
community.description: Tare da al'ummar masu haɓaka da ke bunƙasa a duk duniya, Dubhe yana samun tallafi daga masu goyon baya masu ƙwazo waɗanda ke jagorantar makomar fasahar blockchain na Move. Haɗu, haɗin gwiwa, kuma ku yi girma tare da mu yayin da muke tsara ƙarni na gaba na hanyoyin rarrabawa.

members.label: Membobin Al'umma
members.description: Masu haɓakawa da masu sha'awar da suke aiki a duk duniya

events.label: Abubuwan Duniya
events.description: Tarurruka, haduwa, da taron bita na shekara-shekara

countries.label: Ƙasashe
countries.description: Kasancewar al'ummar Dubhe a cikin nahiyoyi

ecosystem.description: Gano iri-iri na aikace-aikace, ka'idoji, da kayan aikin da aka gina akan Dubhe, daga DeFi da wasanni zuwa kayan aikin gini da NFTs.

defi.title: DeFi
defi.description: Ka'idojin kudin da ba su da tushe

infrastructure.title: Kayan Aikin Gini
infrastructure.description: Kayan aikin masu haɓakawa da kayan aikin gini

nfts.title: NFTs
nfts.description: Abubuwan tari na dijital da kadarori

numeron.name: Numeron
numeron.description: Kasada na AI RPG na Fantasy

schemaDefinition.title: Ma'anar Schema
schemaDefinition.description: Ayyana dabaran wasan ko dApp ɗin ku ta amfani da tsarin schema mai sauƙin fahimta na Dubhe. Bayyana abubuwa, sassa, da tsarine a cikin fayilolin saitawa masu sauƙi.
items: Abu
Sashi
Tsari
Kuskure
Taron

codeGeneration.title: Samar da Code
codeGeneration.description: Injin Dubhe yana samar da 80% na kwangilolinku na Move masu wayo, ɗakunan karatu na abokan ciniki, da hanyoyin hulda da API ta atomatik daga ma'anin schema ɗinku.

deploymentChannel.title: Turawa da Tashar
deploymentChannel.description: Tura zuwa sarƙoƙin Move da yawa tare da umarni ɗaya. Tashar Dubhe tana ba da daidaitawar lokaci-lokaci da <50ms na jinkiri don ƙwarewar mai amfani mara kyau.

multiChainExecution.title: Aiwatar da Sarƙoƙi da Yawa
multiChainExecution.description: Aikace-aikacenku yana aiki ba tare da matsala ba a kan duk sarƙoƙin Move da aka tallafa tare da haɗin kai na sarƙa ta asali ta hanyar Dubhe OS.

competitiveAdvantage.title: Amfanin Gasa
competitiveAdvantage.subtitle: Mafari na farko kuma kawai na cikakken bayani don ci gaban yanayin Move

productSuite.title: Cikakken Stack na Ci gaba da Move
productSuite.description: Samfuran uku da suka haɗu waɗanda ke magance kowane babban matsalar juzu'i a cikin ci gaban Move

engine.title: Injin Dubhe
engine.subtitle: Samar da Code ta Atomatik 80%
engine.description: Kayan aikin ci gaba kaɗai da ke samar da 80% na code Move ta atomatik, yana barin masu ci gaba su mai da hankali kan mahimman ayyukan kasuwanci
features: Rage lokacin ci gaba daga watanni zuwa makonni
Umarnin ɗaya ya tura zuwa dukkan sarƙoƙin Move

channel.title: Tashar Dubhe
channel.subtitle: Ƙwarewar Lokaci-Lokaci Matakin Web2
channel.description: Layer hulɗar P2P da za a iya shirya ta lokaci-lokaci da ke sanya blockchain ta zama kamar Web2
features: Yin hoto na gaba nan take
Tallafin abokan ciniki da yawa na wayar hannu, tebur da yanar gizo

os.title: Dubhe OS
os.subtitle: Cross-Chain Interoperability OS
os.description: Tsarin aiki na blockchain tare da goyon bayan haɗin gwiwar sarƙoƙi da tsarin ƙarfafawa masu ci gaba
features: Tushen code ɗaya, dukkan sarƙoƙin Move
Ladan masu ci gaba da aka gina

networkArchitecture.title: Cikakken Stack na Ci gaba da Move
networkArchitecture.description: Daga kayan aikin haɓakawa zuwa tashoshin hulɗa na lokaci-hakika da kayan aikin rarrabawa - Dubhe yana ba da duk abin da ake buƙata don gina ƙarni na gaba na aikace-aikace masu cikakkun sarkar.
keyMetrics: Daidai da Sui, Aptos, Rooch, Movement, Initia

moveApplications.title: Aikace-aikacen Move
moveApplications.subtitle: DApps da Wasannin ku
moveApplications.description: Gina hadaddun aikace-aikace rarraba tare da tsaro da sassauci na Move

dubheEngine.title: Injin Dubhe
dubheEngine.subtitle: Kayan Aikin Haɓakawa
dubheEngine.description: Yana samar da 80% na code ta atomatik kuma yana ba da cikakkiyar jerin kayan aikin masu haɓakawa

dubheChannel.title: Tashar Dubhe
dubheChannel.subtitle: Layer Lokaci-Hakika
dubheChannel.description: Layer hulɗar P2P don gogewar mai amfani na lokaci-hakika matakin Web2

dubheOS.title: Dubhe OS
dubheOS.subtitle: Kayan Aikin Ketare-Sarkar
dubheOS.description: Tsarin aiki rarraba tare da haɗin gwiwar sarƙoƙi da yawa na asali

completeStackSolution.title: Cikakkiyar Maganin Stack
completeStackSolution.description: Dubhe shi ne na farko kuma kaɗai dandamali da ke ba da cikakkiyar mafita mai haɗewa don ci gaban muhalli na Move - daga samar da code zuwa gogewar mai amfani na lokaci-hakika.

securityFirst.title: Tsaro Da Farko
securityFirst.description: Tabbatarwar al'ada na Move tana tabbatar da kwangilar mai wayo marasa kurakurai

highPerformance.title: Babban Aiki
highPerformance.description: Aiwatarwa na gefe ɗaya da runtime da aka inganta don iyakar throughput

composable.title: Mai Hadewar
composable.description: Ginin modular yana ba da damar haɗawa da keɓaɓɓu mai sauƙi

unifiedState.title: Yanayi Haɗe
unifiedState.description: Tushen gaskiya guda ɗaya a cikin dukan sarƙoƙi da aikace-aikace

networkStats.title: Ƙididdigan Cibiyar Sadarwa
networkStats.description: Ma'aunin lokaci-lokaci da ke nuna ci gaba da ayyuka a cikin yanayin Dubhe.

hero.title: Tallafa wa ci gaban yanayin Dubhe
hero.subtitle: Ta hanyar tallafin masu haɓakawa, shirye-shiryen yanayin muhalli, da ƙoƙarin rarrabawa, Gidauniyar Dubhe tana taimakawa wajen haɓaka girma da karɓuwa na yanayin ka'idar Dubhe.

mission.title: Manufarmu
mission.subtitle: Saurin Ƙirƙira na Move don Kowa

developerSupport.title: Tallafin Masu Haɓakawa
developerSupport.description: Ba da tallafi, albarkatu, da jagora ga masu haɓakawa da ke ginawa akan yanayin Dubhe. Daga hackathons zuwa tallafin aikin na dogon lokaci.
features: Taron bita na ilimi da hackathons

ecosystemGrowth.title: Ci Gaban Yanayin Muhalli
ecosystemGrowth.description: Haɗin gwiwa na dabaru da shirye-shirye don faɗaɗa yanayin Dubhe. Gina gadoji tsakanin sarƙoƙin Move da ka'idoji daban-daban.
features: Haɗin gwiwa na dabaru da sarƙoƙin Move

decentralization.title: Rarrabawa
decentralization.description: Tabbatar da cewa Yanayin Dubhe ya kasance na gaske ya rarraba ta hanyar gudanarwa, shigar da al'umma, da tsarin yanke shawara na rarraba.
features: Yanke shawara da al'umma ta jagoranta

footer.description: Cikakkiyar dandamalin haɓakar Move tare da samar da lambar kai-kai 80%, tashoshi P2P na ainihin lokaci, da haɗin gwiwa tsakanin sarƙoƙi.
footer.copyright: © 2025 Dubhe. Duk haƙƙoƙin an kiyaye su.

hero.title: Haɗu da Ƙungiyar Gidauniyar Dubhe
hero.description: Ƙungiyarmu ta bambanta, ta duniya ta masana injiniya, masu bincike, da masu gina al'umma ta yi alkawarin ci gaban yanayin Move da ƙarfafa masu haɓakawa a duk duniya.

leadership.title: Ƙungiyar Jagora
leadership.description: Saduwa da masu hangen nesa da kwararu waɗanda ke jagorantar manufar Dubhe na juyin juya halin haɓakar Move

jason.name: Jason
jason.bio: Jagora mai hangen nesa tare da shekaru 15+ a fasahar blockchain. Ya jagoranci Ƙungiyoƙi na injiniya a manyan kamfanonin fasaha kafin ya kafa Dubhe don juyin juya halin haɓakar Move.

joan.name: Joan
joan.bio: Tsohuwar mai haɓakar Move tare da zurfin gwaninta a gine-ginen kwangila masu wayo. Tana jagorantar hangen nesanmu na fasaha kuma tana lura da duk ayyukan injiniya.

david.name: David
david.bio: Injiniya na cikakken-stack mai sha'awar kayan aikin masu haɓakawa da ci gaban yanayin muhalli. Yana jagorantar Ƙungiyar haɓakar injin mu kuma yana gudanar da kirkire-kirkire na fasaha.

bonnie.name: Bonnie
bonnie.bio: Maginin al'umma tare da gogewa mai yawa wajen ci gaban yanayin masu haɓakawa. Tana gudanar da shirye-shiryenmu na al'ummar duniya da shirin jakadu.
expertise: Gudanar da Abubuwan da Suka Faru

liam.name: Liam McKenzie
liam.bio: Gwani na ci gaban kasuwanci mai mayar da hankali kan haɗin gwiwa na dabaru da ci gaban yanayin muhalli. Ya jagoranci haɗin gwiwa a manyan kamfanonin blockchain a baya.

emily.name: Emily Smith
emily.bio: PhD a Kimiyyar Kwamfuta mai gwaninta a tsarukan da aka rarraba. Tana jagorantar shirye-shiryenmu na bincike kuma tana binciken fasahoƙin blockchain na zamani.

join.title: Shiga Ƙungiyarmu
join.description: Koyaushe muna neman mutane masu hazaka waɗanda ke da sha'awar ci gaban fasahar blockchain
join.ctaDescription: Tuntuɓa mu game da matsayi da damammaki da ke akwai

engineering.title: Injiniya
engineering.description: Gina makomar kayan aikin haɓakar Move da kayayyakin more rayuwa

research.title: Bincike
research.description: Binciken fasahar blockchain da ka'idoji na zamani

community.title: Al'umma
community.description: Girma da tallafawa al'ummar masu haɓakawa ta duniya

partnerships.title: Haɗin Gwiwa
partnerships.description: Gina alakar dabaru a cikin yanayin blockchain

hero.title: Tallafa wa Ƙirƙirarku
hero.description: Karɓi tallafi mara biyan kuɗi daga Gidauniyar Dubhe don gina aikace-aikacen Move na buɗe tushe, kayayyakin more rayuwa, da kayan aiki. Duk ayyukan dole su zama cikakku kuma su kammala duk abubuwan da suka kai matsayi.

stats.comingSoon: Yana Zuwa Ba da Jimawa Ba

infrastructure.title: Tallafin Kayayyakin More Rayuwa
infrastructure.description: Gina babban kayayyakin more rayuwa, kayan aikin masu haɓakawa, da kayan aikin yanayin muhalli

dapp.title: Haɓakar DApp
dapp.description: Ƙirƙiri aikace-aikacen da ba su da tushe na zamani akan yanayin Dubhe

research.title: Tallafin Bincike
research.description: Binciken ilimi, inganta ka'idoji, da gudunmawa na ka'ida

community.title: Ayyukan Al'umma
community.description: Ilimi, rubuce-rubuce, kayan aikin al'umma, da shirye-shiryen wayar da kan jama'a

process.title: Tsarin Aikace-aikace
process.description: Tsari mai sauƙi mai matakai 5 don samun tallafin aikinku

proposal.title: Ƙaddamar da Shawara
proposal.description: Ƙaddamar da cikakken shawara tare da cikakkun abubuwan da suka kai matsayi da alkawarin buɗe tushe

review.title: Bitar Gidauniya
review.description: Kwamitin fasaha na Gidauniyar Dubhe ya kimanta yiwuwar da tasirin yanayin muhalli

interview.title: Hirar Ƙungiya
interview.description: Gabatar da tsarin hanyar aikinku da nuna iyawar fasaha

approval.title: Amincewa da Tallafi
approval.description: Hukumar Gidauniya ta amince da tallafi mara biyan kuɗi tare da bukatun abubuwan da suka kai matsayi

delivery.title: Isar da Abubuwan da suka kai Matsayi
delivery.description: Kammala duk abubuwan da suka kai matsayi tare da abubuwan da za a bayar da ke aiki kuma ku karɓi cikakkiyar tallafi

requirements.title: Bukatun Aikace-aikace
items: Cikakkiyar alkawarin buɗe tushe (Ana buƙatar lasisi MIT/Apache 2.0)
Cikakken tsarin haɓakar tushen abubuwan da suka kai matsayi
Ƙungiya mai gogewa tare da tabbataccen rikodin haɓakar aiki
Abubuwan da za a bayar da ke aiki gaba ɗaya - babu samfuri ko nunawa
Cikakken rubutu da jagororin turawa
Kyakkyawan daidaitawa tare da burin ci gaban yanayin Dubhe

successStories.title: Labarun Nasara
successStories.description: Ayyukan da suka karɓi tallafi kuma suka yi babban tasiri

nonRepayable.title: Tallafi Mara Biyan Kuɗi
nonRepayable.description: Duk tallafi kyauta ne marasa sharadi daga Gidauniyar Dubhe. Babu buƙatar biyan kuɗi bayan nasarar kammala abubuwan da suka kai matsayi.

openSource.title: Ana Buƙatar Buɗe Tushe
openSource.description: Duk ayyukan da aka tallafa dole su fito a ƙarƙashin lasisi MIT ko Apache 2.0. Cikakken lambar tushe dole ta kasance ga kowa.

completion.title: Cikakken Kammala Abubuwan da suka kai Matsayi
completion.description: Ayyuka dole su ba da cikakkun software da ke aiki, masu shirye-shirye don samarwa. Dole ne a kammala duk abubuwan da suka kai matsayi don karɓar cikakkiyar tallafi.

finalCta.title: Shirye don Gina Buɗe Tushe?
finalCta.description: Nemi tallafin Gidauniya kuma ka ba da gudummawa ga yanayin Dubhe na buɗe tushe

notFound.title: Ba a Sami Shafin Ba
notFound.description: Shafin da kuke nema ba ya wanzuwa ko an matsar da shi.
notFound.suggestion: Kada ku damu, bari mu dawo da ku kan hanya mai dacewa.

actions.report: Bayar da Rahoton Link da ya karye

serverError.title: Kuskuren Server
serverError.description: Wani abu ya yi kuskure a gefen mu.
serverError.suggestion: An sanar da ƙungiyar mu kuma tana aiki kan gyarawa.

unauthorized.title: Ana Buƙatar Tabbatarwa
unauthorized.description: Kuna buƙatar shiga don samun damar wannan shafi.
unauthorized.suggestion: Da fatan za ku shiga da bayanan ku.

forbidden.title: An Haramta Shiga
forbidden.description: Ba ku da izinin samun damar wannan albarkatun.
forbidden.suggestion: Da fatan za ku binciki bayanan ku ko tuntuɓar mai gudanarwa.

rateLimited.title: Buƙatun da Yawa
rateLimited.description: Kuna yin buƙatun da sauri sosai. Da fatan za ku rage sauri.
rateLimited.suggestion: Jira ɗan lokaci kafin ku sake gwadawa.

serviceUnavailable.title: Sabis ba ya Samuwa
serviceUnavailable.description: Mun kashe na ɗan lokaci don gyarawa.
serviceUnavailable.suggestion: Za mu dawo kan layi ba da daɗewa ba. Na gode da haƙurinku!

badGateway.title: Mummunar Gateway
badGateway.description: Akwai matsala da haɗin server dinmu.
badGateway.suggestion: Wannan yawanci na wucin gadi ne. Da fatan za ku sake gwadawa bayan ɗan lokaci.

hero.title: Gina Startup ta Unicorn na Gaba
hero.subtitle: Shiga yanayin shirye-shiryenmu na haɗin gwiwa da Gidauniyar Dubhe ke tallafawa, da aka shirye-shirye tare da Obelisk Labs da VCs na yanayin muhalli don gina Ƙarni na gaba na startups na Move.

funding.value: Yana Zuwa Ba da Jimawa Ba
funding.label: Jimlar Tallafi

startups.value: Yana Zuwa Ba da Jimawa Ba
startups.label: Startups da aka Shirye-shirye

unicorns.value: Yana Zuwa Ba da Jimawa Ba
unicorns.label: Unicorns da aka Kirkira

success.value: Yana Zuwa Ba da Jimawa Ba
success.label: Adadin Nasara

accelerator.title: Mai Gudanar da Gidauniya
accelerator.description: Shirye-shiryen da aka taho da ke da tallafin Gidauniyar Dubhe da aka shirye-shirye tare da Obelisk Labs da VCs na yanayin muhalli
benefits: Haɗin gwiwar VCs na yanayin muhalli

studio.title: Studio na Haɗin Gwiwa
studio.description: Da Gidauniyar Dubhe, Obelisk Labs, da VCs na yanayin muhalli suka shirye-shirye tare da albarkatu da aka raba
benefits: Shirye-shiryen da abokan hulda da yawa suka yi
Albarkatu na fasaha da aka raba
Cibiyoyin Sadarwa na VCs yanayin muhalli

scale.title: Ma'auni na Yanayin Muhalli
scale.description: Ma'auni tare da cikakken tallafi daga Gidauniyar Dubhe, Obelisk Labs, da abokan huldan VCs na yanayin muhalli

coIncubation.title: Shirye-shiryen Abokan Hulda da Yawa
coIncubation.description: Jagorar haɗa ta Gidauniyar Dubhe, Obelisk Labs da VCs na yanayin muhalli

infrastructure.title: Kayayyakin More Rayuwa da aka Raba
infrastructure.description: Samun damar kayayyakin more rayuwar Obelisk Labs da albarkatun VCs na yanayin muhalli

integration.title: Haɗa kai na Yanayin Muhalli
integration.description: Haɗa kai kai tsaye da ayyukan Dubhe da cibiyoyin sadarwa na abokan hulda

development.title: Haɓakawa na Haɗin Gwiwa
development.description: Tallafin fasaha daga Ƙungiyoƙin injiniya na Gidauniyar Dubhe da Obelisk Labs

demoDays.title: Ranakun Demo na Abokan Hulda
demoDays.description: Gabatarwa ga hukumar Gidauniyar Dubhe da cibiyoyin sadarwa na VCs yanayin muhalli

network.title: Cibiyar Sadarwa ta Yanayin Muhalli
network.description: Samun damar duk yanayin Dubhe da kamfanonin abokan hulda

exclusiveAccess.title: Samun Damar Keɓantacce
exclusiveAccess.description: Samun damar farko zuwa sabbin fasaloli, samfura, da sanarwa kafin fitowar jama'a

directCommunication.title: Sadarwar Kai tsaye
directCommunication.description: Sadarwar yau da kullun da Gidauniyar Dubhe da tasiri akan yanke shawara na tsarin hanyar samfur

recognition.title: Sanin da Lada
recognition.description: Sanin na musamman a cikin al'umma, kayan ciniki na musamman, da ladan alama don gudunmawa

globalNetwork.title: Cibiyar Sadarwa ta Duniya
globalNetwork.description: Haɗa kai da mutane masu tunani iri ɗaya kuma gina dangantaka a cikin al'ummar Dubhe ta duniya

requirements: Memba mai aiki a cikin al'ummar Dubhe aƘalla watanni 3
Kyakkyawan fahimtar fasahar blockchain na Move
Gogewa a ginin al'umma ko Ƙirƙirar abun ciki
Alkawari don tallata yanayin Dubhe yadda ya kamata
Ana samunsa aƘalla sa'o'i 10 a mako
Ƙwarewa da Turanci da aƘalla wata harshe ɗaya

communityEngagement.title: Shisshigin Al'umma
tasks: Kula da tattaunawar al'umma kuma kiyaye yanayi mai kyau
Amsa tambayoyin fasaha kuma taimaki sababbi
Shirya tarukan gida da abubuwan da suka faru akan Intanet
Ƙirƙirar abun ciki mai jan hankali (koyarwar, labaran, bidiyo)

ecosystemGrowth.title: Ci Gaban Yanayin Muhalli
tasks: Gano da shigar da sabbin masu haɓakawa zuwa Dubhe
Haɗin gwiwa da sauran jakadu akan shirye-shiryen duniya
Ba da ra'ayi akan samfura da rubutu
Wakiltar Dubhe a tarurruka da abubuwan blockchain

contentCreation.title: Ƙirƙirar Abun Ciki
tasks: Rubuta koyarwar fasaha da jagororin
Ƙirƙirar abun ciki na bidiyo da ke bayyana fasalolin Dubhe
Fassara rubutu zuwa harsunan gida
Raba sabunta yanayin muhalli akan kafofin watsa labarun

hero.badge: Dakunan Gwaje-gwajen Ci Gaba na Dubhe
hero.subtitle: Ƙungiyoyi daban-daban masu ƙwarewa na ci gaba suna aiki tare ƙarƙashin Dubhe Foundation don gina makomar kayan aikin blockchain da ke dangane da Move, kamar Polkadot JAM.

overview.title: Dakunan Gwaje-gwaje Masu Ƙwarewa Hangen Nesa Haɗe
overview.description: Kowanne dakin gwaje-gwaje yana kawo ƙwarewa ta musamman yayin aiki zuwa manufa ɗaya ta ci gaban muhalli na Dubhe

obelisk.name: Obelisk Labs
obelisk.description: Jagorantar ci gaban ƙa'idar blockchain ta asali na Dubhe da kayan aikin harshen Move. Mai mayar da hankali kan hanyoyin yarda, inganta kwangila mai wayo da kayan aikin masu haɓakawa.
contributions: Ginin Ƙa'ida Ta Asali na Dubhe
Inganta Lokacin Aiki na Harshen Move
Injin Aiwatar da Kwangila Mai Wayo
SDK Masu Haɓakawa da Jerin Kayan Aiki

cyferio.name: Cyferio Labs
cyferio.description: Ƙware a fasahohin kula da keɓaɓɓu, shaidun sifiri-ilimi da ƙa'idodin cryptographic na muhalli na Dubhe. Gina ƙarni na gaba na kwangila mai wayo na sirri.
contributions: Kwangilar Mai Wayo Masu Kula da Keɓaɓɓu

network.name: Dubhe Network Labs
network.description: Gina mafita na sadarwa mai ƙarfi, ƙa'idodin sadarwa na lokaci-hakika da kayan aikin girma na muhalli na Dubhe.

bridge.name: Dubhe Bridge Labs
bridge.description: Haɓaka ƙa'idodin gada na duniya da mafita na haɗin kai don haɗa Dubhe da sauran muhallai na blockchain ba tare da matsala ba.

research.title: Yankunan Binciken Haɗin Kai

protocol.title: Ci Gaban Ƙa'ida
protocol.description: Ƙa'idodin blockchain na asali, hanyoyin yarda da inganta harshen Move

infrastructure.title: Kayan Aiki da Girma
infrastructure.description: Sadarwa mai ƙarfi, sadarwar lokaci-hakika da mafita na girma

crossChain.title: Fasahar Ketare-Sarkar
crossChain.description: Ƙa'idodin haɗin kai, gada na duniya da mulkin sarƙoƙi-da-yawa

privacy.title: Keɓaɓɓu da Tsaro
privacy.description: Shaidun ilimi-sifiri, ƙa'idodin kula da keɓaɓɓu da binciken cryptographic

research.contributingLabs: Dakunan Gwaje-gwaje Masu Bayar da Gudunmawa:

collaboration.title: Tsarin Ci Gaban Haɗin Kai
collaboration.description: Yadda dakunan gwaje-gwaje da yawa ke daidaitawa don ba da aiwatar da ƙa'idodin haɗe

research.title: Bincike
research.description: Binciken haɗin kai da tsarin ƙa'ida a cikin dukan ƙungiyoyi

development.title: Ci Gaba
development.description: Aiwatarwa na gefe ɗaya tare da ma'auni da interfaces na rabo

testing.title: Gwaji
testing.description: Gwajin haɗin kai tsakanin ƙungiyoyi da tabbatarwa

deployment.title: Turawa
deployment.description: Turawa mai daidaitawa da haɗin muhalli

cta.title: Shiga Ƙirƙira
cta.description: Zama ɓangare na gina makomar kayan aikin blockchain na tushen Move

hero.subtitle: Kuna da tambayoyi game da Dubhe? Kuna son yin hadinkai da mu? Muna so mu ji muryarku.

form.title: Aika mana da saƙo
form.sendError: An gaza aika saƙon. Da fatan za a sake gwadawa.
form.networkError: Kuskuren cibiyar sadarwa. Da fatan za a bincika haɗinku kuma a sake gwadawa.

success.title: An aika saƙon!
success.message: Za mu dawo gare ku cikin sa'o'i 24-48.

options.investment: Tambaya Game da Saka Hannun Jari

message.label: Saƙo
message.placeholder: Faɗa mana game da aikinku, tambayarku ko yadda za mu iya taimakawa...

info.title: Bayanin Tuntuɓa
info.description: Ko kuna mai haɓakawa, mai saka hannun jari, ko kawai kuna sha'awar Dubhe, muna nan don taimakawa. Tuntuɓe mu ta kowanne hanyar da ke ƙasa.

hero.title: Abubuwa masu zuwa
hero.subtitle: Shiga abubuwan da Dubhe ke shirya, taron masana'antu, haduwar al'umma, taron masu haɓakawa da sauransu.

table.noEvents: Babu abubuwan da suka dace da bukatunku.

engineWorkshop.name: Taron Koyarwar Masu Haɓaka Injin Dubhe
engineWorkshop.description: Zurfafa bincike kan ginin Injin Dubhe da mafi kyawun ayyukan haɓakawa

moveAma.name: AMA Muhalli na Move tare da Dubhe Foundation
moveAma.description: Tambaya mu komai game da ƙa'idar Dubhe, taswirar hanya da ci gaban muhalli

sfMeetup.name: Haduwar Al'ummar Dubhe - San Francisco
sfMeetup.description: Sadarwa da masu haɓaka Dubhe da membobin al'umma a yankin Bay

zkWorkshop.name: Taron Koyarwar Mafita na Keɓaɓɓu na Ilimi-Sifiri
zkWorkshop.description: Koyi game da shaidun ZK da ƙa'idodin kula da keɓaɓɓu a muhalli na Dubhe

community.title: Shiga Al'ummarmu Ta Duniya
community.description: Haɗa kai da masu haɓakawa, masu sha'awa da masu ƙirƙira daga ko'ina a duniya a abubuwan mu

hero.subtitle: Taimaka wajen kula da yanayi mai aminci, maraba da samar da aiki na al'ummarmu ta duniya. Shiga ƙungiyar masu gudanarwa masu himma da ke tabbatar da tattaunawa mai inganci da tallafawa dukan membobi.

responsibilitiesSection.title: Abin da Masu Gudanarwa Suke yi

communityModeration.title: Gudanar da Al'umma
communityModeration.description: Kula da tattaunawa masu lafiya, aiwatar da jagororin al'umma da tabbatar da yanayi mai maraba ga dukan membobi

securitySafety.title: Tsaro da Aminci
securitySafety.description: Gano da hana spam, yaudara da ayyukan da ba su dace ba don kare membobin al'umma

memberSupport.title: Tallafin Membobi
memberSupport.description: Taimaka wa sabbin membobi su fara, amsa tambayoyi da jagorantar masu amfani zuwa albarkatu masu dacewa

contentCuration.title: Tsara Abun Ciki
contentCuration.description: Nuna abun ciki mai inganci, shirya bayanai da kula da ingancin tattaunawar al'umma

moderatorsSection.title: Sanar da Masu Gudanarwanmu
moderatorsSection.description: Ƙungiyarmu mai himma tana ba da rufe 24/7 a dukan yankunan lokaci da dandamali

requirements: Memba mai aiki na al'umma aƙalla watanni 3
Fahimtar zurfi na muhalli na Dubhe da fasahar Move
Kyawawan ƙwarewa na sadarwa da warware rikici
Samun damar yin ayyukan gudanarwa a yankunan lokaci daban-daban
Gogewa na gudanarwa na baya ya fi dacewa
Sadaukar da kai ga yanke shawara mai adalci da rashin son kai

rules: Bi da dukan membobin al'umma da girmamawa da ladabi
Yi amfani da harshe mai bayyana da ƙwarewa a dukan hulɗa
Rage rikici da inganta tattaunawa mai gina jiki
Kasance mai haƙuri da sababbi kuma ka ba da jagora mai amfani
Aiwatar da dokokin al'umma cikin daidaito da adalci
Rubuta dukan ayyukan gudanarwa tare da dalilai masu bayyana
Ɗaga matsaloli masu rikitarwa zuwa manyan masu gudanarwa ko masu gudanarwa
Hanyoyin dubawa da neman ƙara yakamata su zama bayyane
Kare keɓaɓɓun masu amfani da bayanai na sirri
Kada ku taɓa raba kayan aikin gudanarwa ko bayanan shiga
Bayar da rahoton raunukan tsaro nan da nan

cta.title: Shirye kuke don Taimaka wa Al'ummarmu?
cta.description: Shiga ƙungiyar gudanarwanmu kuma ku taimaka wajen samar da yanayi mai aminci da maraba ga kowa

hero.subtitle: Dandamali na haɓakawa tushen schema wanda ke samar da kwangilar mai wayo, APIs da abubuwan UI ta atomatik. Mayar da hankali kan abin da ke da mahimmanci - dabaran kasuwancin ku na musamman.

featuresSection.title: Gina Sauri, Jigilar Sauri
featuresSection.description: Injin Dubhe yana ɗaukar nauyin aiki don haka za ku iya mayar da hankali kan ƙirƙira

codeGeneration.title: 80% Lambar Atomatik-Samarwa
codeGeneration.description: Rage lokacin haɓakawa sosai tare da samar da lambar mai hankali wanda ke ɗaukar boilerplate, tsarin bayanai da samfuran gama-gari ta atomatik.
details: Samar da lambar da schema ke jagoranta
Samar da endpoints na API ta atomatik

schemaBased.title: Ci Gaba Tushen Schema
schemaBased.description: Bayyana tsarin bayananku sau ɗaya kuma barin Injin Dubhe ya samar da komai dabam. Canje-canje suna yaduwa ta atomatik a cikin dukan aikace-aikacenku.

realTimeToolchain.title: Jerin Kayan Aikin DApp na Lokaci-Hakika
realTimeToolchain.description: Gina aikace-aikace masu cikakkiyar sarkar tare da iyawar lokaci-hakika. Daga yanayin wasa zuwa aikace-aikacen kudi, komai yana faruwa nan take.

multiChain.title: Tallafin Sarƙoƙi-da-yawa
multiChain.description: Tura akan sarƙoƙi da yawa masu tushen Move ba tare da canza lambarku ba. Rubuta sau ɗaya, tura ko'ina.

workflowSection.title: Daga Ra'ayi zuwa Samarwa a Matakai Sauƙi 4

defineSchema.title: Bayyana Schema
defineSchema.description: Ƙirƙiri samfuran bayananku da dabarun kasuwanci ta amfani da harshen bayyana schema mai fahimta

generateCode.title: Samar da Lambar
generateCode.description: Injin Dubhe yana samar da 80% na lambar aikace-aikacenku ta atomatik gami da kwangilar mai wayo da APIs

customizeLogic.title: Keɓanta Dabara
customizeLogic.description: Mayar da hankali kan 20% na musamman - dabarar kasuwancin ku, fasaloli na musamman da gogewar mai amfani

deployInstantly.title: Tura Nan Take
deployInstantly.description: Turawa sau ɗaya akan sarƙoƙi da yawa na Move tare da ingantawa da sa ido ta atomatik

cta.title: Shirye kuke don Ninka Saurin Ci Gaban ku har 10x?
cta.description: Shiga masu haɓakawa da ke gina makomar aikace-aikace masu cikakkiyar sarkar

hero.title: Layer Hulɗa
hero.subtitle: Gogewar mai amfani matakin Web2 tare da kayan aikin Web3. Jinkiri ƙasan milliseconds 50 na aikace-aikacen wasa, dandamali na zamantakewa da kasuwanci da aka gina akan blockchains Move.

features.title: Kayan Aikin Lokaci-Hakika
features.subtitle: na DApps Na Zamani
features.description: An gina don aikace-aikace da ke buƙatar amsawa nan take da gogewar mai amfani mara kyau

latency.title: Jinkiri Ƙasan-50ms
latency.description: Hulɗa P2P na lokaci-hakika tare da amsawa matakin Web2. An gina don aikace-aikacen wasa, kasuwanci da zamantakewa da ke buƙatar martani nan take.
details: Algorithms na hanya da aka inganta

network.title: Cibiyar Sadarwa P2P Mai Girma
network.description: Girma na kwance wanda ke girma tare da tushen masu amfaninku. Daga daruruwa zuwa miliyoyin haɗin gwiwa na lokaci guda ba tare da raguwar aiki ba.

security.title: Amintacce ta Asali
security.description: Ɓoye ƙarshe-zuwa-ƙarshe da tabbatarwar cryptographic suna tabbatar da cewa bayananku da hulɗarku sun kasance masu zaman kansu da kuma rashin iya canzawa.

experience.title: UX Web2, Backend Web3
experience.description: Gogewar mai amfani da aka sani wanda kayan aikin rarraba ke tayar da shi. Masu amfani suna samun mafi kyau na duniyoyi biyu ba tare da rangwame ba.

gaming.title: Wasannin Lokaci-Hakika
gaming.description: Wasannin ƴan wasa da yawa tare da lokutan amsa nan take

social.title: Dandamalin Zamantakewa
social.description: Cibiyoyin sadarwar zamantakewa rarraba tare da saƙon lokaci-hakika

trading.title: Aikace-aikacen Kasuwanci
trading.description: Kasuwancin mitar yawa tare da bayanan farashi na lokaci-hakika

architecture.title: Ginin Cibiyar Sadarwa
architecture.description: Hanya mai matakan da yawa don ingantaccen aiki da girma

application.title: Layer Aikace-aikace
application.description: DApp ɗinku yana haɗawa ta APIs masu sauƙi

network.title: Cibiyar Sadarwar P2P Ta Duniya
network.description: Cibiyar sadarwar taurari ta Dubhe da ke haɗa nodes na duniya don sadarwar jinkiri kadan sosai

cta.title: Shirye don DApps na Lokaci-Hakika?
cta.subtitle: Shiga cibiyar sadarwar da ke tayar da ƙarni na gaba na aikace-aikace masu hulɗa

hero.title: Muhalli na Move
hero.subtitle: Muhalli haɗe da ke haɗa blockchains masu tushen Move tare da mulkin ketare-sarkar, gada na duniya da tsaro na rabo a cikin dukan cibiyar sadarwa.

features.title: Token Daya, Sarƙoƙi da yawa
features.subtitle: Gogewa Haɗe
features.description: Yi hulɗa cikin sauƙi a cikin dukan muhalli na Move tare da mulki na rabo da gada na duniya

token.title: Muhalli na Token na Asali
token.description: Tattalin arzikin token haɗe da ke tayar da dukan muhalli tare da mulki, staking da fasalolin amfani a cikin dukan sarƙoƙi da aka haɗa.

bridging.title: Gada Na Duniya
bridging.description: Canja wurin kadarori mara kyau tsakanin sarƙoƙi masu tushen Move tare da kammala nan take da kuɗin kadan.

governance.title: Mulki Rarraba
governance.description: Yanke shawara na al'umma don sabunta ƙa'ida, gudanar da baitulmali da ci gaban muhalli.

security.title: Tsarin Tsaro Haɗe
security.description: Tsarin tsaro na rabo da ke ba da kariya a cikin dukan sarƙoƙi da aikace-aikace da aka haɗa.

cta.title: Shiga Muhalli na Move
cta.subtitle: Zama ɓangare na muhalli haɗe na Move ketare-sarkar

hero.title: Tsara Makomar
hero.subtitle: Gabatar da shawarwari ta DubheOS don neman kuɗin baitulmali, sabunta runtime, ko shiga mulki ta amfani da tsarin OpenGov na Polkadot tare da zaɓen gaskiya.

treasury.title: Kashe Kuɗin Baitulmali
treasury.description: Neman kuɗi daga Baitulmalin Dubhe don ayyukan ci gaba da shirye-shirye

governance.title: Canje-canjen Mulki
governance.description: Gyare-gyare ga hanyoyin zaɓe, gudanar da baitulmali da sigogin mulki

runtime.title: Sabunta Runtime
runtime.description: Inganta ƙa'ida da gyare-gyaren runtime da ke buƙatar amincewar mulki

emergency.title: Ayyukan Gaggawa
emergency.description: Shawarwari masu jin lokaci don matsalolin tsaro da gyare-gyaren ƙa'ida masu mahimmanci

active.title: Referenda Masu Aiki
active.subtitle: Referenda na yanzu a cikin hanyoyin mulki daban-daban tare da zaɓen gaskiya

process.title: Tsarin Mulki
process.subtitle: Tsari mataki-mataki na ƙirƙira da zaɓe shawarwarin mulki

cta.title: Shirye don Shiga?
cta.subtitle: Shiga tsarin mulki kuma ku taimaka wajen tsara makomar Dubhe

hero.title: Keɓaɓɓenku
hero.subtitle: Koyi yadda Dubhe Foundation ke kare keɓaɓɓenku da sarrafa bayananku da bayyane da tsaro.

introduction.title: Gabatarwa
introduction.content: A Dubhe Foundation, muna sadaukar da kanmu wajen kare keɓaɓɓenku da tabbatar da tsaron bayanan ku na sirri. Wannan Manufar Keɓaɓɓu tana bayyana yadda muke tattara, amfani, bayyana da kare bayananku lokacin da kuke amfani da dandamali, ayyuka da aikace-aikace da suka shafi muhalli na Dubhe blockchain.

collection.title: Bayanai Da Muke Tattarawa
items: Bayanai na sirri da kuke bayarwa lokacin amfani da ayyukanmu
Bayanai na fasaha game da na'urarku da haɗin cibiyar sadarwa
Bayanai na amfani da bincike don inganta dandamalinmu
Adiresoshin wallet da bayanan ma'amaloli blockchain

usage.title: Yadda Muke Amfani da Bayanai
items: Don samar da inganta dandamalin haɓakawa blockchain dinmu
Don aiwatar da aikace-aikacen tallafi da shirye-shiryen incubation
Don sadarwa game da sabunta, abubuwa da damammaki
Don tabbatar da tsaron dandamali da hana damfara

protection.title: Kariyar Bayanai
items: Muna aiwatar da matakan tsaro na masana'antu
Ana ɓoye dukan bayanai masu hankali a cikin sufuri da hutawa
Ba mu taɓa ajiye makullan sirri ko bayanai masu hankali na wallet ba
Bincike na tsaro na yau da kullun da bitar bin doka

sharing.title: Raba Bayanai
items: Ba mu sayar da bayanai na sirri ga ɓangare na uku ba
Raba iyaka tare da masu ba da sabis ƙarƙashin yarjejeniya masu tsauri
Bayanai na blockchain na jama'a suna da bayyana a zahiri
Muna iya raba bayanai don cika buƙatun doka

access.title: Samun Dama da Sarrafawa
items: Nemi samun dama ga bayanan ku na sirri
Gyara bayanai marasa daidaito
Share asusunku da bayananku
Fitar da bayananku

communication.title: Sadarwa
items: Fita daga sadarwar kasuwanci
Zaɓi abubuwan da aka fi so na sanarwa
Sarrafa saitunan cookies
Neman iyakoki akan sarrafa bayanai

contact.title: Tambayoyi Game da Keɓaɓɓu?
contact.description: Idan kuna da wasu tambayoyi game da wannan Manufar Keɓaɓɓu ko ayyukanmu na bayanai, don Allah ku tuntuɓe mu.

hero.title: Sharuɗɗan
hero.subtitle: Waɗannan sharuɗɗa suna sarrafa amfaninku na ayyukan Dubhe, dandamali da kayan aikin blockchain.

introduction.title: Bayyani na Yarjejeniya
introduction.content1: Barka da zuwa Dubhe! Waɗannan Sharuɗɗan Sabis ("Sharuɗɗa") suna samar da yarjejeniya mai ɗaure ta doka tsakanin ku da Dubhe Foundation ("mu," "namu" ko "namu") game da amfaninku na dandamalin blockchain, kayan aikin haɓakawa da ayyuka masu alaƙa.
introduction.content2: Ta amfani da ayyukanmu, kuna yarda cewa kun karanta, fahimta kuma kun yarda ku kasance ɗaure da waɗannan Sharuɗɗa da Manufar Keɓaɓɓunmu. Idan kuna amfani da ayyukanmu a madadin kungiya, kuna wakilta cewa kuna da ikon daure wannan kungiya ga waɗannan Sharuɗɗa.

acceptance.title: Karɓar Sharuɗɗa
items: Ta samun dama ko amfani da ayyukan Dubhe, kuna yarda ku kasance ɗaure da waɗannan Sharuɗɗa
Idan ba ku yarda da kowane ɓangare na waɗannan sharuɗɗa ba, ba za ku iya samun dama ga ayyukanmu ba
Muna iya sabunta waɗannan sharuɗɗa lokaci-lokaci ba tare da sanarwa ba
Ci gaba da amfaninku yana samar da karɓar sharuɗɗan da aka gyara

usage.title: Amfani da Ayyuka
items: Dole ne ku kasance mai shekara 18 ko fiye don amfani da ayyukanmu
Kuna da alhakin kula da tsaron asusunku
Ba za ku iya amfani da ayyukanmu don wani dalili ba bisa ka'ida ko marar izini ba
Muna riƙe da hakkin kawo karshen asusun da suka karya waɗannan sharuɗɗa

intellectual.title: Mallakar Hankali
items: Dubhe Foundation tana riƙe da dukan hakkokin fasaharmu ta musamman
Abubuwan bude ido suna ƙarƙashin lasisin su daban-daban
Kuna riƙe da ikon mallakar abun ciki da kuka ƙirƙira ta amfani da dandamalinmu
Kuna ba mu lasisi don amfani da abun cikinku don ba da ayyukanmu

disclaimers.title: Watsi da Alhakin da Iyakoki
items: Ana ba da ayyukanmu 'kamar yadda suke' ba tare da garantin kowane nau'i ba
Ba mu da alhakin kowane barna mai kaiwa kai tsaye, abin da ya faru ko sakamako
Ma'amalolin blockchain ba za a iya juyar da su ba kuma ba za mu iya juyar da su ba
Kuna yarda da yanayin gwaji na fasahar blockchain

participation.title: Shiga Cibiyar Sadarwa
items: Ana rikodin ma'amaloli akan blockchains na jama'a
Kudin cibiyar sadarwa ya shafi ayyukan blockchain
Kwangilar mai wayo ba ta canzawa da zarar an tura ta
Kuna da alhakin daidaiton ma'amaloli

risks.title: Yarda da Hadari
items: Fasahar blockchain tana gwaji ce
Darajar tokens na iya zama mai saurin canzawa
Kwangilar mai wayo na iya ƙunsar kurakurai
Cunkoson cibiyar sadarwa na iya shafar aiki

governance.title: Doka da Sarrafa da Rigima
governance.law: Waɗannan Sharuɗɗa za a fassara su kuma a sarrafa su bisa ga dokokin yankin da aka kafa Dubhe Foundation, ba tare da la'akari da tanadin rikicin dokokinsa ba.
governance.disputes: Duk wani rikici da ya taso daga waɗannan Sharuɗɗa ko amfaninku na ayyukanmu za a warware ta hanyar sasantawa mai ɗaure bisa ga ka'idodin sasantawa na kasa da kasa.
governance.modifications: Muna riƙe da hakkin gyara waɗannan Sharuɗɗa koyaushe. Ci gaba da amfani da ayyukanmu bayan canje-canje yana samar da karɓar Sharuɗɗan da aka gyara.

contact.title: Tambayoyi Game da Sharuɗɗa?
contact.description: Idan kuna da wasu tambayoyi game da waɗannan Sharuɗɗan Sabis, don Allah ku tuntuɓi ƙungiyar doka namu.

hero.subtitle: Shiga cikin al'ummarmu ta duniya na masu goyon baya masu himma kuma ka taimaka wajen gina makomar ci gaban blockchain na Move. Ka jagoranci al'ummomi na gida, ka kirkiro abun ciki kuma ka bunkasa tsarin halittu a duk duniya.

benefitsSection.title: Me yasa za ku shiga Shirinmu na Jakadanci?

exclusiveAccess.title: Samun Dama na Musamman
exclusiveAccess.description: Samu damar farko ga sababbin fasali, kayayyaki da sanarwa kafin a fitar da su ga jama'a

directCommunication.title: Sadarwa kai tsaye
directCommunication.description: Sadarwa akai-akai da Gidauniyar Dubhe da kuma tasiri akan yanke shawarar hanyar ci gaba

recognition.title: Yabo da Lada
recognition.description: Yabo na musamman a cikin al'umma, kayayyaki na musamman da kyautar alamun gudummawar

globalNetwork.title: Cibiyar Sadarwa ta Duniya
globalNetwork.description: Haɗa kai da mutane masu ra'ayi ɗaya kuma gina dangantaka a cikin al'ummar Dubhe ta duniya

ambassadorsSection.title: Saduwa da Jakadodinmu na Duniya
ambassadorsSection.description: Jakadodinmu suna jagorantar ci gaba a yankuna nasu, suna gina al'ummomi da kuma inganta karɓa

requirements: Memba mai aiki a cikin al'ummar Dubhe aƙalla watanni 3
Fahimtar zurfi game da fasahar blockchain na Move
Gwaninta a ginin al'umma ko ƙirƙirar abun ciki
Alƙawari na inganta tsarin Dubhe da kyau
Samun lokaci aƙalla sa'o'i 10 a mako
Sanin Turanci da aƙalla wata harshe ɗaya

communityEngagement.title: Haɗin kai da Al'umma
tasks: Gudanar da tattaunawar al'umma da kuma kiyaye yanayi mai kyau
Amsa tambayoyin fasaha da taimakon sabbin mutane
Shirya tarurrukan gida da ayyukan kan layi
Ƙirƙirar abun ciki mai jan hankali (koyarwa, labarai, bidiyo)

ecosystemGrowth.title: Ci gaban Tsarin Halittu
tasks: Gano da shigar da sabbin masu ci gaba zuwa Dubhe
Haɗin gwiwa da sauran jakadodi kan shirye-shiryen duniya
Bayar da ra'ayi akan kayayyaki da takaddun
Wakiltar Dubhe a tarurrukan blockchain da al'amuran

contentCreation.title: Ƙirƙirar Abun Ciki
tasks: Rubuta koyarwa da jagororin fasaha
Ƙirƙirar abun cikin bidiyo da ke bayyana fasalin Dubhe
Fassara takaddun zuwa harsunan gida
Raba sabuntawar tsarin halittu akan kafofin watsa labarun

cta.title: Shirye ka Jagoranci Al'ummarkka?
cta.description: Shiga shirinmu na jakadanci ka zama jagora a cikin tsarin Move
